Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Instrument display flickering. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Contamination ingress through damaged seal assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Radar System component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 21/01/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair
